Reviews.Title: “don't leave anthing behind”
Reviews.Author: pzipp67
Reviews.Content: We have stayed here many times on our trips to FL. The property is close to attractions that we use. On our last visit I left an item behind.....I checked out of the hotel at 7am...called them the next day at 9 am. I was told that housekeeping was not in!! What hotel has no housekeeping working at 9 am??? I explained that I left an item on top on the tv--told them the room number. The desk clerk informed me that nothing was found in that room. I told her that I was not calling to see if they found it that I was calling to let them know I was coming to get the item. Only person with access to the room would be housekeeping---it was obvious to me that housekeeping found my person item and stole it! I will not be staying at this property again and do NOT recommend it to anyone!! If you can;t trust your housekeeping staff to turn in anything they find in the room....who knows when they enter your roomand take whatever they want!! DO NOT STAY HERE!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel with Great Breakfast!”
Reviews.Author: laraine13bb
Reviews.Content: Since I rented a car, I preferred a competitively priced hotel close to and with ready access to Disney's Epcot Center and Universal Orlando's Islands of Adventure. The hotel is above average for its class with special mention for clean comfortable beds and linens. Free Wi-Fi was a refreshing change since this was a working vacation and every place I've stayed before charges, so it freed me from having to decide whether it was worth purchasing. Their complimentary hot breakfast was a great way to get an early start for the day and offered different tasty entrees which included pancakes, French toast, sausage, biscuits & gravy and the like in addition to the traditional continental variety. Cheerfully working front desk staff was also very helpful in answering all my travel related questions. I will definitely be coming back the next time I'm in the area.

Reviews.Title: “Bad Stay”
Reviews.Author: FDLT
Reviews.Content: Well, first, my sheets were stained with what looked liked blood (I did take pictures of this) so i slpet in the other bed and woke in the morning to find a frog on me! Again, I did take pictures of this. So my stay was not a good one. I was booked there for 5 days and I checked out by 0900 on the morning of the second day. The hotel did refund my monet however, they only refunded three of the days and not all four stating " they would only refund 3 days and they were keeping 1 day as a penalty even though I had checked out by 0900." STAY AWAY from this hotel!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Heritage Park Inn”
Reviews.Author: DMSims
Reviews.Content: This is a nice friendly atmosphere at a low affordable price. Clean, carpet a little worn and needs some fresh makeovers, but if room is in poor shape ask for another, they normally will change your room if others are available. Very low costs yet still is safe, clean, and overall good place to stay. Thumbs up

Reviews.Title: “Great time at Heritage”
Reviews.Author: allan w
Reviews.Content: Excellent priced, large, clean rooms. A little dated but kept up well. Staff very friendly and helpful. The night clerk, Jimmie, was one of the nicest people we met on our trip. Funny, accomodating, and knowledgeable about places to see.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing time at heritage park inn”
Reviews.Author: Newyorkvisito
Reviews.Content: First of all amazing placing so close to the Daltona 500, disney & subways (my favorite place in the world). The service was extrodinary my favorite employee ALBERTO he is charming, funny & hard working as I observed. He advised me this amazing rodeo dinner that I ate this amazing home made mashed potatoes (also recommended for anyone who stays there). Over all very clean & attentive defintatly worth a look see.

Reviews.Title: “I had an excellent stay”
Reviews.Author: Ken L
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent hotel. My room was clean, the bed comfortable, the staff was super friendly and the price couldn't be beat. I stayed here one night (02-10-12) and definitely recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “Dated but Good Value”
Reviews.Author: Indyman46
Reviews.Content: We recently spent 3 nights here. This Hotel is very dated - however, the rooms are large, and clean - beds are ok, pillows, ok - shower, ok. the staff is very friendly and the breakfasts aren't bad. For the price it is not a bad deal. We have stayed in some $150 night hotels that weren't any better.

Reviews.Title: “Convenient, Great Staff, and Great Location”
Reviews.Content: I needed a place to stay for a conference that was reasonably priced and convenient to the interstate and turnpike. Arriving I was greeted very kindly (though it was late at night). The room was spotless. Even being on a major thoroughfare, it was quiet and I was able to sleep soundly. The room was comfortable with everything that I needed. The pool was nice, with a really pretty parklike courtyard. Lots of room, lots of parking. A lot of major restaurants close by for my convenience. A very comfortable week and I highly recommend this motel to anyone traveling to Orlando and especially the theme parks.

Reviews.Title: “Great value, great staff, clean rooms, definitely will visit again”
Reviews.Author: Heather W
Reviews.Content: This was our first time staying outside of Downtown Disney and we won't be staying there again after finding this precious gem of a place. The staff were great! They were friendly, informative and extremely helpful. The rooms were clean, comfortable, updated, quiet and spacious. Very nice pool area and great continental breakfast (try not to miss it). This hotel is great for families and couples. We will definitely be going again. It's location is perfect- it's close, only minutes, to the parks and near the turnpike for even quicker access.

Reviews.Title: “Use cash you won't regret it.”
Reviews.Author: j s
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this place for a few weeks because i was waiting for my place to become ready. In the course of 4-5 weeks I spent over $1500. After I departed my card was charged for an additional night even though I checked out & received a statement saying I owed $0. After repeated calls I finally get the manager days later & tell him the problem. He said I owed another day which is far from the truth. He then went on to explain that I should have been happy to pay a reduced rate that I was being charged. Story behind that goes is that I was paying a rate of $34.99 daily but they had an ad on craigslist for $700 monthly. I took my tablet to his office & showed him the ad which he was unaware of but yet honored the price. So I failed to realize how I became so lucky to get an advertised rate. I even went so far to explain that when I paid on 12/24/11 there was a problem with me being charged twice. The front desk associate & housekeeper who was present at the time figured it out because as she stated it happened before but I was told he was not allowed to make those decisions. So I was being told again I owed money but nobody can tell me who,what,where,when or why. Don't get me wrong the staff is helpful Jimmy , Alberto & the nameless others that you come to depend on. When my belongings were locked in the safe for days the guy that continued to try & help me I thank him as well. I see that the manager replies here & I am sure he will have come up some reason why I owed the money when he says how this is all my fault. I have a final statement showing I owe $0 & had a previous problem on 12/24 with my account.. Next time someone complains about debt/credit card charges you may want to actually know why you charged the card. The phrase " because you must have owed it " - that's pretty vague.

Reviews.Title: “Good Value - Great for Parks - Friendly & Helpful Staff”
Reviews.Author: Carly W
Reviews.Content: We stayed here and had a friendly warm welcome from Jimmy who was helpful for our 5 day stay. Wi-Fi and lobby internet access and printer (handy for park booking & vouchers). Rooms were clean and good sized. Easy to drive to Parks and Downtown. On this street there is everything you would require- 100s of restaurants, supermarkets, petrol stations etc.

Reviews.Title: “Great value & real service from nice people”
Reviews.Author: Jonathan G
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for 3 nights in September whilst attending my son's wedding in Disney. The room was fine and kept clean & tidy, the pool was perfect for a morning swim, and breakfast was simple but plentiful. But I reserve my highest praise for the staff who were helpful, kind and nice people who made me feel very much at home. Others in the wedding group paid an awful lot more just to stay in fancy hotels in Disney - and still complained!

Reviews.Title: “Not at all as website described”
Reviews.Author: travelalotcb
Reviews.Content: Behind the front door looks moldy the bed linens were dirty had to call two times for clean ones. The latch on the door is broke the toilet doesn't flush the ceiling in the bathroom has had a leak and looks disgusting. We would check out and leave to.another hotel but just got in and have to be up in 6 hours. Hopefully we don't get bit by anything. Oh and the light doesn't work. Hopefully we will survive tonight

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Value”
Reviews.Author: MrKite58
Reviews.Content: Recently stayed here for 4 nights. The staff was exceptionally friendly and helpful, especially Mary and Alberto. They were both very pleasant and helpful in all my interactions with them. The lobby and dining areas are very bright and cheerful. The free continental breakfast didnt offer a lot of variety, but was freash and very good, a pleasant surprise in a hotel at this price level. Pool area was huge and very clean, a very nice place to hang out and relax. My room was very dated and in desperate need of a makeover, but nonetheless, it was clean and comfortable. Overall, I thought the Heritage Park Inn was a tremendous value and certainly worth a look if you are staying in the area.

Reviews.Title: “Trying, but falling short”
Reviews.Author: John M
Reviews.Content: 1st room had a leaking toilet...been that way for a long time (lots of corrosion). We were immediately moved to another room (and appreciated the response). But that toilet 'ran', little ants seen in bathroom along with a couple of little cockraches. We needed a working remote control for TV (which was replaced immediately). The complimentary shampoo container was empty!! Both ice machines (only 2 for the entire complex?!?!) were broken, and no alternatives were suggested by front desk. The television was way beyond its prime. The water seems to have an 'odor' to it. The breakfast area is great, and the food variety pretty good. Had a quiet night's sleep, and generally, the front desk was helpful. At one time this was a beautiful facility...but sooooo many things need upgrading. We wish the new owner well!!!

Reviews.Title: “Not friendly”
Reviews.Author: dab2048
Reviews.Content: This is a hard review to write because there are alot of ups and downs. I have to rate it as poor due to the rude lady I had at my check in. She was talking to the other person working and acted like i wasnt there. When I tried to ask her a question she acted like she just wanted me to leave. The room itself was nice alot of tv channels didnt work and one of the beds mattress was well past its prime but for the price I didnt care. There was a van which kept parking in every space which made me feel uncomfortable I called the front desk and got no answer so just kept an eye out. If your looking for service don't stay here.

Reviews.Title: “The price it's right...”
Reviews.Author: NUNIZ
Reviews.Content: We stayed 2 nights. The king bed room was very clean, bed was very comfortable and bathroom was clean too. Breakfast was good and convenient. BUT I think if you have a couple staying on a first floor room, it wouldn't be a good idea to put a whole family in a room exactly above with small children!!! Second night was very loud for a few hours, thankfully when we called the front office they took care of it. We will be back again!

Reviews.Title: “nice rooms”
Reviews.Author: ron m
Reviews.Content: rooms are clean and staff is helpfull close to places to eat and to highway

Reviews.Title: “Nice for the Price”
Reviews.Author: KPDLadybug
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed here one night after being at a different hotel previous nights. We had a king bed, single serve coffee maker, mini fridge, iron and ironing board, and a hair dryer in our room. The staff could've been more attentive when we asked for more coffee in our room, but that would be the only negative. The hot breakfast was pancakes, link sausage, and biscuits with cold food items such as cereal. There was a microwave available for making oatmeal and a four slot toaster with sliced bread and bagels.

Reviews.Title: “The front desk staff was very helpful and knowledgeable about the area.”
Reviews.Author: cassandra S
Reviews.Content: The front desk staff was very helpful and knowledgeable about the area. We came in unexpectedly and needed an emergency fax and the lady at the front desk was so kind and friendly. We tried to tip her but she wouldn't take it. Great service!!

Reviews.Title: “Great people...excellent rooms”
Reviews.Author: Forrest P
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at Heritage Park Inn on a variety of occations . Management and staff are very supportive and accommodating. Their rooms have always been clean and comfortable. They have always responded to my requests in a timely manner. Their pricing is competative and I enjoyed their morning complimentary breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “Was worth the money, very nice stay”
Reviews.Author: Mrs C
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 2 weeks, the staff was friendly and helpful. Breakfast every morning, rooms are very clean and comfortable.. hated to leave, have stayed in alot of hotels in the Kissimmee area over the years, this was the best one yet!

Reviews.Title: “Accomodations just about perfect”
Reviews.Author: Ben S
Reviews.Content: My wife and I attended a three day religious convention at a local arena. The hotel was just a under a mile to the site. We have stayed at this location for the past four years during the annual convention days. It was, as always, just about perfect. All the hotel personnel were professional and friendly in handling their respective responsibilities. We had personal interface with the front desk folks, the housekeeping ladies and the breakfast service help. It was a stay with all our comfort and needs taken care of with efficiency, TLC and genuine hospitality. The decoration and cleanliness was superb. The hot selections, which varied each day, for breakfast, along with the many other goodies offered, were a wonderful treat and presented in a fine way. We will continue to visit the Orlando/Kissimmee area of Florida and use the Heritage Park Inn as our home away from home. We thank the management and staff for a wonderful experience.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome”
Reviews.Author: JDRider
Reviews.Content: I enjoyed the stay. The room was very comfortable and located in a great location for me. The front desk personal was very inviting and understanding . I've never felt more welcomed.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Breakfast & very clean room”
Reviews.Author: Trevor F
Reviews.Content: This is my first time writing a review. But the custmer service that this hotel gave me felt like I was at a 5 star resort. The only thing I can say is try it I am sure you will see the difference.

Reviews.Title: “horible nasty”
Reviews.Author: tom m
Reviews.Content: stay far away from this place as possible total misrepresentation in the pics and description are of this hotel 15 / 20 years ago beds had blood stains and i found diabetic test strips nasty so you know they don't change sheets towels where all stained and worn hotel looked like it hasn't had any upkeep for years all ice makers are broken black mold growing all over the walls in the pool lots of wasp nests in hallways hot breakfast consisted of gravy to put on biscuits and orange cool-aid nasty

Reviews.Title: “Best in the area!”
Reviews.Author: judy22172
Reviews.Content: We stopped at a few motels before choosing the Heritage Park Inn, we are so glad we did. From the moment we walked in, the staff was so helpful, the room was large and clean. We were a bit nervous about staying after reading other reviews, but we did not see anything wrong with this motel. The free hot breakfast was perfect, had eggs one day and pancakes the next, the pool was perfect. We couldn't get the internet to work, but Maria at the desk was so helpful, she took time to come to our room to help us log on. Customer service means alot to us, and they took the time to help us with everything, from places to eat to directions and we made another reservation for the fall.

Reviews.Title: “Awful!”
Reviews.Author: alysha1979
Reviews.Content: This hotel had snakes all over the pool yard area that the front worker clearly stated they had no control over because they have nesting under the pool..... There were cockroaches in the rooms.... Pull back my covers to find urine stained sheets and comforter that were there from the last stay.... Refrigerator broke and spoiled all our perishables... Beds not made when we return to our rooms.. Ants in one of our double beds... Service people never came to rooms so we had to keep calling for tissue paper and towels .... Spider webs and lizards out of control.... I requested for a refund to move I was told the manager would contact me THE NEXT DAY which never happened.... Air conditioner stayed on and still never cooled off.... This place was terrible ... Absolutely horrible... Glad that I never have to see it again!

Reviews.Title: “me and husband stayed there for a get away”
Reviews.Author: smiles123411
Reviews.Content: my mother got me the room for my birthday so me and my husband could have some time away from my child so we went and injoyed the pool and a goodnight sleep the people there were very helpful and nice and the breakfast we had a little of everything we wanted so thank you for your services and your kindness and we will be back and will send others

Reviews.Title: “Great Holiday Weekend Trip!”
Reviews.Author: sycamoresqaw
Reviews.Content: This was a last minute fishing trip. The hotel was clean and cool, the beds were comfortable. We kept our boat there safely and didn't worry about things missing out of it. We would stay there again! The only thing was the ice machine near the room was out of order and we were not told where the working one was and we didn't ask until leaving.

Reviews.Title: “Very dirty and worn down”
Reviews.Author: dirtyroom163
Reviews.Content: Our room was far from acceptable and this was second time we have been here. We didn't have a choice as it was business paid. Our first experience was not much better. Here were the issues with this recent stay. *Carpet had large stains all over it *Sheets had visable stains including one that was a surface stain like toothpaste *Sink faucet had issues so that a small forceful stream came out and would actually knock off your toothpaste. Was impossible to wash your hands so I used the tub faucet *Sink drain was also slow to drain. After the fixed the faucet, the sink would fill up with water while brushing teeth or washing hands *Bathtub had obvious mold around caulking, luckily I bring my own disenfectant when I travel to hotels. *You had to hold down handle on toilet for it to flush *Our phone in room was messed up. We could hear the front desk but they couldn't hear us. Had to use cell phone to call and complain that first night. *Towels were very worn down and should be replaced *Ceiling had obvious mildew/mold stains in corners *Iron needed to be replaced *Had to have AC unit checked. On third night, it began making an awful squeeking noise and we had to turn it off to sleep. On our first night after getting back to room at 10:00 pm we made the front desk aware of the issues. The next day, they were not handled so we left the room service attendent a note. This is how we had to communicate to get things done. We travel to this city each year and have told the company in charge of booking our room that we refuse to stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Death awaits when you sleep”
Reviews.Author: rewerts85
Reviews.Content: First off I travel a lot and usually go for the under dogs but this hotel is more like a motel. First is I traveled from orange county to orlando to visit my brother and wanted a hotel close to Disney world and the air port. Second I checked in and they said they were booked and only had one room left, ten minutes later my brother comes in to check in and he gets a room next to me which was cool of them. After we went out to eat and come back we go in the rooms and thats when we notice the bad things. While we were walking to our rooms the paint on the wall was chipping and the rails for the stairs were loose and rusted. We enter the room to find my room had the locks broken and a broken ironing board and iron. My brothers room had stained sheets and broken towel rack which was funny and sad. When we called to get his sheets replaced the guy comes up walking his dog and just hands him the sheets. He also lied about those stains not being blood and being make up. The pool closes at dusk and they didnt even have lights in the pool. We woke up to people walking by and after we had the terrible sleep we went to look at the pool and the water was greenish!!! I called expedia and had them change me to a holiday inn next to the park and not in the ghetto. This hotel is 40 mins away from all the parks and another 45 from the MCO airport. The manager offered me to stay for free but I turned it down because my dauther got out at night due to the locks being broken. F-

Reviews.Title: “I felt very comfortable and the staff was beyond friendly!”
Reviews.Author: triverajr08
Reviews.Content: I travel a lot with my company and I stay at many different hotels, and this one is in my top 10! The service was great and they are very accomodating. I have certain standards on little things and everything I requested was done before I arrived so when I walked into my room I had everything I needed and didnt need to call up and question anything. My computer needed to be charged and I had a very important email I had to respond to and I called the front and even tho it was late they assured me I was able to use the computer in the business area at any point. That is great service in my book and they were a great help! A huge thank you to the staff!

Reviews.Title: “Nice place to stay!!!”
Reviews.Author: Hotelqueen21
Reviews.Content: I needed a quick place to stay for the night during a business trip... the hotel was quick off the turnpike and quick on the next day. Upon checkin the front desk associate was very nice and accomodating to my needs. The room was clean and inviting! They set my wake up calls and all was good! I had the luxury of staying for breakfast the following morning....pancakes and sausage! Yum! :) Checkout was easy and quick. I felt very comfortable at this hotel and the staff was wonderful! Thank you all!~ If you are in the area, please stop by this hotel... you will enjoy your night!

Reviews.Title: “Web advertisements are total mis representation”
Reviews.Author: samihm
Reviews.Content: The first room we were put in, the beds were not even made. We were put in another room, (167) the bedspread has bleach stains on, sheets were thin and worn; the ceilings appeared to have mold stains, wallpaper border was hanging loose in several locations; cobwebs behind nightstands; dust along floor under windows; dirt or mold spots on walls; bathroom tub dirty, back of door peeling; grout dirty, tub in need of caulking; refrigerator did not work, hair dryer had to shake it several times to keep it running; grounds around building were not mowed and in need of maintenance. Wanted to go swimming, pool was shut down and green. The rates were great but was so disappointed to have our weekend of watching our grandsons state bmx championship, shaded by the low standards of this hotel. I have pictures to back up what I am saying and plan to send then to the corporate office.

Reviews.Title: “Loved it!”
Reviews.Author: alyguti918
Reviews.Content: I was on a business trip,and found this quaint hotel to stay in. I was greeted with a smile and a hello and given excellent service. My room was clean,the internet was fast and I enjoyed the convience of how close it was to my destination. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone and ask for Alberto to help you with your stay,he was very courteous to me and helpful.

Reviews.Title: “The hotel was nice, but the svc. was.. ehhh”
Reviews.Author: Portabella227
Reviews.Content: I can honestly say that this hotel was very nice-clean, good rooms and definitely a bargain. I did need to get extra towles, at one point though and after calling a few times to the front desk i had to go down. found that there was no one at the desk; the girl was outside having a smoke and seemed... less than enthused to do anything. I think her name was Mayline or something. Other than that, I enjoyed my stay though. It's pretty obvious that there will always be those on the job that dont care, or have an attitude and just want to play around having boyfriends hanging out at the job and all, but then when I was checking out there was another very helpful young man on the job [Albert I think]

Reviews.Title: “Perfect!”
Reviews.Author: TravelGallery
Reviews.Content: I stayed in the 114 unit. The room is right across from the swimming pool so go swimming was very convenient. I love the large, clean and well-lighted swimming pool. The landscape outside of my windows was serene. They have so many trees! The room and linens were clean. They have a brand new stainless steel microwave and refrigerator in my room! The ice machine is conveniently located. I got fresh and delicious ice. The staff were warm and friendly. Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: “My Company recommended it. Now I would recommend.”
Reviews.Author: lakesidejimmy
Reviews.Content: Had a conference at the Heritage Park Inn Kissimmee Fl. They treated us like we were the only group in the hotel. Ate breakfast with a family from the UK and they said they have been coming to Kissimmee for 12 years and this was there first time at this hotel, and planned on coming back again. They thought it was very very clean, and warm and great value, just like I found. The only thing I really wanted was a hot tub, but the pool was great and very large. I think you will like it.

Reviews.Title: “for the price i thought it was great”
Reviews.Author: calvo2_11
Reviews.Content: i had a very pleasant stay, everyone i spoke to was great, it was clean, and i slept like a baby, thanks, i will be back

Reviews.Title: “I felt like I was on an episode of CSI”
Reviews.Author: Mypawco
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel for one night after flying in to Orlando, the hotel is on a very busy road which is difficult to access from the road. We choose this hotel because it was close to the turnpike and we had an early start the next day. Check in was fine, the loby is beautiful, staff was friendly. We parked around back to unload the car and I felt like there should have been crime sceen tape around the breezeway. There was water all over the ground with electrical cords in the water. The pool was gross and green. It was probably closed but we didn't ask-as we planned for a short stay. The room was just creepy, lots of screaming coming from the room next door. I will not stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Avoid this hotel at all costs.”
Reviews.Author: toho_fisher
Reviews.Content: This hotel was recommended by a friend who stayed there two years ago. It was a "Quality Inn" at the time. After we made reservations, we realized that the HP Inn was no longer a part of the choic hotels group. We decided to stay anyway because we were going fishing and wanted to stay close to the ramps. The website said that the rooms had outside electrical connections for hybrid cars, boats, rv's, and more. No outside outlets could be found. The ice machine was out of service, along with the pool. It sounds like the Ice machine has been down for a while. The hotel looks rather run down and outdated. The interiors are old. The bed spreads, sheets, and towels are old and extremely worn. One of our bed spreads even had holes burned in it. They ran out of towels on one of our three days. There could have only been 15 people staying in the hotel, but yet they didnt have any more towels. You could hardly call them towels though, because they were so worn out, torn, and small. The door was far from air tight, as I could see under the door and smell cigar smoke coming in under the door. The A/C units were noisy (our room and our friends room). The control switches on our unit were going bad and we had to mess around with them to get the AC to really cool the room. The shots used on the hotel website DO NOT represent what the hotel looks like now. I couldn't wait to get home and take a shower to feel clean again. The breakfast also doesn't start till 8, which doesn't work for people who are up at 6-7AM to travel or fish. The staff wasn't very helpful. I would never recommend anyone stay at this hotel. They had banners saying they were the best rated in the area, but that doesn't say much. I would look for a nicer chain hotel in St. Cloud or Kissimmee.

Reviews.Title: “wash your windows”
Reviews.Author: desmtg
Reviews.Content: didn't want to touch anything in the room! spend a lot of time making fancy towel and toilet paper bows instead of washing windows and wiping clean surfaces. Also the web page describes a lot of services they don't have... full breakfast ice machines that work they don't tell you the internet password Price was cheap but it wasn't a bargain!

Reviews.Title: “Feels like home when away from home.”
Reviews.Author: nylatina
Reviews.Content: I checked in12-24-2010 I will be here a while. I feel comfortable, peaceful and really at home. The staff is like my new family and Joe the general manager is a great person. I would suggest this Inn to everyone. You have Dennys across the street for breckfast and Kissimmee Steck house right next to it for dinner, what more can you ask for. Not to mention the Osceola Heritage park where the baseball team plays from the Houston Astros. Oh did I mention that my cousin plays for the team. For the family with children McDonalds & Burger king is also close by. I am in the company of my two year dog who is my companion. He is a beautiful dotsun. Hope to see you here. You will see me from time to time walking Blacky. Ms DeJesus.

Reviews.Title: “Don't Waste Your Money”
Reviews.Author: bmilo
Reviews.Content: Upon check-in the first room had no phone and a cigarette burn in the comforter. They changed us. It was just as bad if not worse. Was supposed to have a microwave, but didn't. Towels were so old they were frayed on the edges and had holes in them. The pillow on my bed had a blood stain that they tried to remove but didn't work. It was gross. Refrigerator was old and when turned on with a light switch it made a humming sound all night. I did not feel secure there at all and had a unclean feeling all night. There was a used thin piece of soap left in the soap holder. They left us two thin bars of wrapped soap for the three of us. Thank God it was only for one night. There were cats roaming the property. One cat wandered into our room when the door was left open to move to the next room.

Reviews.Title: “friendly well equiped hotel”
Reviews.Author: cazzie6
Reviews.Content: stayed overnight here found the reception staff very helpful. The rooms were large, comfortable and clean. Very good value. for the price hard to fault

Reviews.Title: “Home away from home!”
Reviews.Author: LisaP32
Reviews.Content: Just spend one night, very tired after driving all day. The hotel is located just off The Florida Turnpike so it was so easy to find. The night person, I think her name was Kelly was so friendly at 2 in the morning. She asked me if I needed a late check out since I was coming in so late. Nice touch! I got down just in time for Breakfast, Eggs and Sausage, who can ask for more than that, and it was FREE! My room was very spacious and clean, the whole staff seemed very happy and were always working. Before I left I had to stop in and see the General Manager (Joe Appi) to commend him on his staff and the hotel. Thanks everyone, I will be back with my family for sure!

Reviews.Title: “HOME AWAY FROM HOME!”
Reviews.Author: Tight_Wad_10
Reviews.Content: As soon as I arrived in Kissimmee, I was welcomed with open arms by the entire staff; everyone from owner to management to housekeepers! I was amazed at how hospitable & professional they were! Quite honestly, I was a skeptic and, as most skeptics do, assumed that they were giving off that "1st impression" for a moment, however I was delightfully surprised to quickly learn that they are just as warm & hospitable on a daily basis! I was surely impressed & got quite comfortable within the friendly atmosphere rather quickly. I loved that they serve a complimentary hot breakfast every single morning & they have a variety menu so I never tired of it....and it was quite tasty! I not only was impressed by the staff, but also by the loving, furry mascot, Simba-the-cat! Yes, Simba most deffinitely takes his job responsibilities rather seriously and is a wonderful Director of Fun (yes, this is his true title listed on his business card!) I can honestly say my experience at the Heritage Park Inn has been absolutely wonderful & I would highly recommend EVERYONE patron this hotel whenever you're in the area!

Reviews.Title: “excellent choice”
Reviews.Author: DUTCHANDFREE54
Reviews.Content: while attending a seminar I stayed at the Heritage Inn, and was pleasantly suprised at the value for my dollar , the cleanlyness and the pleasant staff at this motel.

Reviews.Title: “mommy on a budget”
Reviews.Author: proudmama143
Reviews.Content: My kids had a great time. The pool was sparkling clean, the rooms were clean, the AC ice cold. Not a lot of cable channels but have HBO and Disney for the kids. Free WIFI which is a plus, no hidden charges, check in and out was quick and easy, staff friendly. It was quiet we slept comfortable. For the price its a good place to stay, just know that Sea World/Disney Orlando are 25-30min plus, a little far for me. Down the street was fast food heaven had all kinds of food.

Reviews.Title: “Great value and a really nice place”
Reviews.Author: stephsdad
Reviews.Content: Stayed with my family in April and had nothing but good things to say about our experience.The place was clean, comfortable and everything advertised. No complaints. Kids loved the pool (even though it was chilly out). Great value in a pretty expensive city.

Reviews.Title: “Do not stay at this worn out, terrible facility......”
Reviews.Author: smttrav
Reviews.Content: The Heritage Inn is so bad it has been booted out of the Choice Hotels group, but it continues to use the Quality Inn and Choice Hotels identification and literature. Rooms are dirty and worn out, nothing works, complimentary breakfast includes stale baked goods and wrinkled apples. Room phones were dead on and off through a 5 day stay. Attached restaurant is boarded up and closed down. Stay elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: “Lovely, quiet getaway spot thats close to everything.”
Reviews.Author: photos4
Reviews.Content: We traveled to Florida from Colorado to look at colleges for our daughter. This little place was perfect! We got two connecting rooms so the kids had their own space and we had ours. The pool was not heated but warm enough even in April. We were greeted every morning by Simba the hotel cat and the friendly staff serving us a lovely breakfast. A really nice feature was being able to check into our return flights and print our boarding passes from the lobby. We would like to say a special thank you to Maria & Chris at the front desk and Brian the GM. Thanks for making our stay with you a great one. Hopefully we will see you again in August when we move our college student down.

Reviews.Title: “Moments away from the Turnpike-PERFECT!”
Reviews.Author: hapitrvlr
Reviews.Content: My stay was for one night on 4/10/10. The property is not much to look at when you 1st see it but the rooms are clean. It's moments away from the Turnpike. You can easily get to all the 'hotspots' in Orlando. It's also not far from 417 which leads you to Orlando Airport (MCO); and also connects to 528 which will get you to Cape & Port Canaveral. The front desk Lady, Maria, is really professional and friendly. The Sales Director is also very nice addition to this property. The property, to be honest, could use some more 'sprucing up' (paint, carpet, bathroom) but it's fine. The breakfast is not spectacular but it's edible and will get you started for your day. Today there was scrambled eggs, home fries, toast, mini-pecan cinnamon rolls, Hot & Cold cereal, OJ/Milk, Coffee/Tea. I noted the hotel site does not have a lot of photos and the past reviewers didn't post any either. So...I did! I definitely recommend this property to those needing a good night's sleep for their next day journey.

Reviews.Title: “Great value, Conveniently located!”
Reviews.Author: db611009
Reviews.Content: Very Clean, well managed. Breakfast was included...nice big pool!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: HobbesAuGres
Reviews.Content: Spent the weekend in Orlando and stayed here. Nice clean rooms and friendly staff. Great free hot breakfast. Felt like home away from home. Will definitely come back and stay.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value and Great Service.”
Reviews.Author: MariaCapone
Reviews.Content: Great Hotel to stay, they offered free hot breakfast everyday and this is a plus specially for kids, my children loved it. All the Stuff were friendly and helpful and made our stay enjoyable. Definetely We will Come Back this Summer.

Reviews.Title: “Run away from this place!”
Reviews.Author: cartoy23
Reviews.Content: This hotel is obviously going out of business. My room was dirty and smelled bad. The general manager is absolutely clueless and rude. If you have reservations there, cancel them while you can! Sheets were not clean on the bed, and I did not feel safe at all while there. There is no security.

Reviews.Title: “Business- easy and safe”
Reviews.Author: NewYearsEveOrlando
Reviews.Content: Was living down in Vero at the time... stayed a few days while looking for employement... easy access from the turnpike and close proximity to the attractions... right down the way from Disney. Service was friendly and I forgot my computer.. They googled information for me and printed it out besides mapquested directions as to where I was going throughout the day.. Definitely would come back.. didn't take advantage of their breakfast buffet but it looked good. I will stay there again.. perfect on a budget and I felt safe and well taken care of.. Actually because of my experience here, I went to another Quality Inn in Sebring on New Years Eve and had a great experience there as well.. I never thought of Quality Inns before this year but now will start staying in them on my travels..

Reviews.Title: “Best breakfast around”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at a lot of hotels, this one trys harder than any other to please the guest. The free breakfast had eggs, waffles, fruit, sauage it was great. I understand the hotel is going to become an independent in March. I really don't care what name is as long as it doesn't change. I give this place many stars in making guest feel at home.

Reviews.Title: “Home away from Home”
Reviews.Author: tennis2121
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the Quality Inn Heritage Park to attend a convention. The staff was so friendly and made me feel so welcome. I asked for directions to several places and not only did they give them to me verbally but they printed them out for me and made sure I knew where I was going. As a woman traveling alone this was very comforting to me. Rooms were clean and neat and the housekeeping staff was very thorough. I intend to bring my children back on Spring Break. Very pleasant experience.

Reviews.Title: “We enjoyed our stay immensely...we were close to many attractions and hotel services were very helpful.”
Reviews.Author: friends15
Reviews.Content: Hotel accommodations were very adequate. The people who worked at the hotel were very friendly and helpful. Rooms were clean. Location was great because it was near attractions that we were interested in.

Reviews.Title: “Disappointed”
Reviews.Author: heartofmyheart
Reviews.Content: Hotel, grounds and area in general appear to have declined since the last time I stayed there about a year ago. Hotel room was not clean when I entered. There were dead bugs in the bathtub, better than live ones, but still bad. The room was hovever cleaned well when I returned from my seminar. The shower was difficult to adjust- either all hot or all cold water. The last night I stayed my neighbors were drinking(obviously alcohol) and hanging around outside their room and were very loud also came in at 2:30 A.M. and were loud then. There appeared to be no security present at any time. I saw a live roach the day I was packing up to check out.

Reviews.Title: “Great Staff”
Reviews.Author: Boulder49
Reviews.Content: After a long 16 hour trip we came to the Qaulity Inn Heritage Park around 1:30am. The person that was working that shift went out of their way to make us feel at home. The rooms was very nice and the pool was great the next morning. I have stayed in many hotel all over the country and the staff was one of the best.

Reviews.Title: “Fishing & Golf Trip”
Reviews.Author: Rockydoc
Reviews.Content: Had a great time, great value, nice rooms & great beds. Will be back.

Reviews.Title: “Stay Away”
Reviews.Author: kling
Reviews.Content: This hotel is dangerous. No security. Very run down in desperate need of repair. Front desk was rude and offered no help. The rooms were dirty. Hotel should be condemned...

Reviews.Title: “Way overpriced”
Reviews.Author: Flgeri
Reviews.Content: This was a very low quality Quality Inn. The price was very high for the accommodations. No refrigerator, microwave, or even a luggage rack. Most Quality Inns I have stayed at offer a continental breakfast. This one offered nothing. Spent the night tugging to put the sheets back on that kept popping off on both sides. The only thing good about it was that it was close to the Florida Turnpike.

Reviews.Title: “Great for the money!”
Reviews.Author: Tamjr
Reviews.Content: The hotel is old but the rooms are clean. The front desk staff were very helpful and accomodating in extending our checkout. Ask fo a room in the back or inside courtyard to get away from road noise. The best Mexican Restaurant anywhere is attached to the hotel. Like the hotel, the restaurant building is old but the food is excellent. The owner is the cook and grows all his own tomatos, peppers, cilentro etc etc and it shows in the quality of the food. The "regular Margarita" is $10 but I bet you can't drink 2! Again all natural ingredients no mix here.

HotelInfo.Name: Heritage Park Inn
HotelInfo.Address: 2050 East Irlo Bronson Mem Hwy, Kissimmee, FL 34744
